body.name: VIVO Wall Mount Conversion Pole Bracket, for Single or Dual Monitor Mount Arms, Standard 1-3/8 inch Diameter, Universal Compatibility, Weight Capacity 44 lbs, Black, MOUNT-WCB01
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 13 mins
features: Easy Wall Mount Conversion - Go from desk mount to wall mount in no time with this easy conversion bracket! Simply attach your existing monitor mount arm collar to the wall mount pole for a quick and easy conversion! --Patent Pending--

Universal Compatibility - Standard 1 3/8” diameter pole works with your existing VIVO monitor mount or other types of mounts for a versatile setup. Installs to wood studs for a secure hold and supports up to 44 lbs in weight.
Create a Custom Wall Mount - Pair our conversion bracket with stand-alone monitor arms for a customized wall mount solution to meet your needs.
Space Saving Floating Mount - Use the conversion pole to easily mount your monitor above your desk to save valuable work space while maintaining an ergonomic height.
We've Got You Covered - Sturdy steel design is backed with a 3 Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.
body.description: WALL MOUNT CONVERSION Convenience - Do you already have a VIVO monitor desk stand, and you’d like a wall-mounted monitor? This conversion mount offers a quick, affordable solution! Sturdy Construction - Solid steel design holds your monitor(s) safe and secure for long-lasting use. DIY Style - If you don’t currently have a monitor stand, this wall-mounted pole bracket will work with any compatible stand-alone arm of your choice.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MOUNT-WCB01 Black Monitor Mount to Wall Conversion Bracket The solid steel wall mounted pole is 1 3/8” in diameter for a wide compatibility with VIVO and other types of monitor mounts on the market. Simply slide your existing stand’s arm collar over the wall mounted pole, secure, and you’ve got a floating monitor solution! Our conversion bracket is designed to support single or dual monitor arms and supports up to 44 lbs in combined weight across screens. Are you more of a DIYer? Pair this conversion bracket with a stand-alone arm for a customized setup. Wall mounting your monitors is a great way to achieve ergonomic heights while saving valuable space on your desktop. Get ready for a truly customized work setup with this monitor desk mount to wall mount conversion!

᷾ Specs Mounting Hardware: Provided for Wood Stud InstallationWeight Capacity: 44 lbsPole Diameter: 1 3/8”Product Dimensions: 5.9” x 2.5” x 1.6” WALL MOUNT CONVERSION Convenience - Do you already have a VIVO monitor desk stand, and you’d like a wall-mounted monitor? This conversion mount offers a quick, affordable solution! Sturdy Construction - Solid steel design holds your monitor(s) safe and secure for long-lasting use. DIY Style - If you don’t currently have a monitor stand, this wall-mounted pole bracket will work with any compatible stand-alone arm of your choice.
Space Saving Display Save room on your desk by securing your monitor screen conveniently to the wall.

EASY 3 STEP INSTALLATION Mark Drilling Locations First, place the wall mount in the desired location, and use a pencil to mark drilling locations. Install Wall Mount Then, using your electric drill, secure the wall mount to the wall using the provided hardware. Secure Monitor Arm Lastly, secure the arm to your new wall mount for an elevated screen setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for mounting a monitor arm
reviews.reviewText: I got a new monitor mount for my armchair office for our new office and needed a way to mount my laptop under it. I got this to mount a monitor arm and then a VESA-mount laptop tray. It works absolutely fantastically. Three screws into a stud is more than enough to hold even a huge monitor. This is solid and a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked with my Amazon monitor arm
reviews.reviewText: I used this for my Amazon monitor arm mount that didn't have a wall mount. It worked very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good sturdy mount
reviews.reviewText: Good sturdy mount that works as expected. I could not use the provided screws. They are cheap soft pot metal. The philips head strips before it goes all the way in, rendering the mount useless. Had a time getting it out. I used star bit screws and was able to drive them right in to the studs with no stripping. I bought 2 of these and needed to mount in a place without a stud. I used large toggle bolts that did the trick. Don't fight the provided screws, just find an alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the coating but it made the OD too large to connect my Ergo arm too. Had to spend a long time disassembling the mount, rigging it up to a drill, to sanding off the layer of paint to be able to use them. Probably works with cheaper arms but the ergo arm has a tight tolerance to work out of box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars swivels a bit
reviews.reviewText: maybe the screw holes are a bit big for the screws, but when you extend the monitor, sometimes it tilts a bit and becomes crooked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good mount horrible cheap lag screw
reviews.reviewText: Mount itself is good quality but the installation was terrible because the screws stripped. Every other mount ive had were hex bolts that you ratchet in after you drill the pilot hole. These are regular Phillips head screws. I couldnt turn by hand these into the stud so I got my impact wrench and the heads stripped immediately. Too much hassle to return so just got some lag bolts and now its in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Said universal but that felt like a lie. Wouldn’t even fit their own arm.

reviews.reviewerName: UPFIELD MEXICO S DE RL DE CV
reviews.reviewTitle: Es bueno pero solo para un monitor que no pese nada
reviews.reviewText: Es funcional si tienes una pantalla que no pese mucho en mi caso termino cayéndose ya que el área para empotrar es muy pequeña y quedan muy juntos los tornillos
